ch.aplu.jcardgame
Class CardActor

java.lang.Object
  ch.aplu.android.Actor
      ch.aplu.jcardgame.CardActor
All Implemented Interfaces:
GGActorCollisionListener, GGBorderListener, GGTileCollisionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class CardActor
extends Actor

Class that represents the game grid actor that belongs to the sprite image of a card.

You find a general description of the JCardGame library in the Card class documentation.

See Also:
Card

setX

public void setX(int x)
Assigns a new current virtual horizontal cell coordinate. The location may be outside the range of the cells inside the game grid.
